alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 9:24PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... South Branch Buffalo River at Sabin affecting Clay County. Buffalo River near Hawley affecting Clay County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Wild Rice River (MN) at Twin Valley affecting Norman County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Buffalo River near Hawley. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD STAGE. Railroad underpass at US Hwy 10 floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tonight and continue rising to a crest of 10.0 feet Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
